## Source: ossf-package-analysis (2642490b83d016ecc3054a845fdc706427d118fe6e9ffe76c7da074eb34798cf)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'storyblok-rich-text-astro-renderer-workspace' @ 99.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
